message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It is a unique opportunity that aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. I am confident it will bring significant value to your endeavors. Let's discuss how we can make this happen.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a price of $1100000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of that, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1250000 for the product. This price reflects the value we place on the transaction and our commitment to ensuring a mutually beneficial outcome.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to meet my budget constraints. I would like to propose a price of $1150000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1225000 for the product. This price reflects the value of the product and our commitment to finding a fair solution for both parties.
Thank you for your latest proposal, Alice. I understand the value of your product and appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose a price of $1175000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1212500 for the product. This price reflects the value of the product and our commitment to finding a fair solution for both parties.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your continued efforts to meet my budget. I would like to propose a price of $1190000 for the product.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1206250 for the product. This price reflects the value of the product and our commitment to finding a fair solution for both parties.
